ventserver.protocols.application package¶

Sans-I/O protocols for all application-layer protocol logic.

Modules:

states: protocol logic for state synchronization. lists: protocol logic for list synchronization.

Submodules¶

ventserver.protocols.application.states module¶

Application-specific logic.

class ventserver.protocols.application.states.ScheduleEntry(time: float, type: Type[betterproto.Message])[source]¶

Bases: object

Output schedule entry.

time: float¶
type: Type[betterproto.Message]¶
class ventserver.protocols.application.states.Synchronizer(*args, **kwds)[source]¶

Bases: ventserver.sansio.protocols.Filter

State synchronization filter.

Inputs are clock updates or state updatess received from the peer. Outputs are state updates for the peer.

all_states: Dict[Type[betterproto.Message], Optional[betterproto.Message]]¶
current_time: float¶
init_all_states() → Dict[Type[betterproto.Message], Optional[betterproto.Message]][source]¶

Initialize the synchronizable states.

Each pair consists of the type class to specify the states, and an actual object to store the state values.

init_output_schedule() → Deque[ventserver.protocols.application.states.ScheduleEntry][source]¶

Initialize the output schedule.

Each pair consists of the type class to specify the message to output for the next output, and the time (in seconds) to wait after outputting that message before proceeding to outputting the next message.

input(event: Optional[ventserver.protocols.application.states.UpdateEvent]) → None[source]¶

Handle input events.

message_classes: Mapping[int, Type[betterproto.Message]]¶
output() → Optional[betterproto.Message][source]¶

Emit the next output event.

output_deadline: Optional[float]¶
output_schedule: Deque[ventserver.protocols.application.states.ScheduleEntry]¶
